com.onlinephoneauctions.dbconnect

Class ConnectionUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.onlinephoneauctions.dbconnect.ConnectionUtil

  • public class ConnectionUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that contains the necessary static methods to retrieve the Connection with the database and make the specific requests. This class will automatically connect to the database on server start-up (using the static initializer block), if not it will probably fail miserably and will require the administrator to check some logs.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static java.sql.Connection conn
      Connection containing the connection to the database that will be initialized on server start-up in the static initializer block
      private static java.lang.String DB_URL
      String that contains the database url with the user and password defined in /resources/application.properties

    • Method Detail

      • getMultipleColumns

        public static java.util.List<java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.String>> getMultipleColumns(java.lang.String query,
                                                                                                       int numberOfColumns)
        Method used for selecting from the database. The output of this method is not guaranteed to work properly when the given query is not returning the requested number of columns! This is a helper method that lets the user work with classic Java objects, rather than ResultSet and other java.sql objects
        Parameters:
        query - the query
        numberOfColumns - the number of columns expected to be returned

      • parseUpdateQuery

        public static java.lang.String parseUpdateQuery(java.lang.String query)
        Method used for updating / inserting into the database.
